name: wheezily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or sounds like wheezing (= making a high, rough noise while breathing, usually with difficulty): She coughed wheezily for a few moments before resuming the conversation. The prayer wheels creaked wheezily on their hinges as they were turned. Related words
wheeze
wheezy
More examplesFewer examplesHe laughed wheezily to himself throughout the interview.He was breathing wheezily after rushing up three flights of stairs.The fact that you are speaking wheezily after doing a few light chores makes me wonder if you have asthma.
